name: intertribal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between or involving different tribes (= groups of people who share the same language, culture, and history): They both played an important role in overcoming intertribal rivalries. Cultural differences and inter-tribal squabbling further complicate matters. Related word
tribal
More examplesFewer examplesThe intertribal warfare of long ago is forgotten today.The tribes gathered along the banks of the river to confer on intertribal issues.Pontiac's War was a three-year intertribal uprising against the British.Defining identity in a time of multiracial and intertribal marriages was a big concern in Native American communities.
